movies.title: Jing zhuang nan xiong nan di

biography.bio: Joyce Chan is an actress, known for Chu lian wu xian Touch (1997), San chuen lao see II: Sik ji ngoc gwai (2000) and Ye boon saam dim jung (1997).
biography.name: Joyce Chan

biography.bio: Monica Chan was born on October 28, 1966 in Hong Kong. She is an actress, known for Full Alert (1997), Double Tap (2000) and God of Gamblers II (1991).
biography.name: Monica Chan

biography.bio: Pak-Cheung Chan was born on September 7, 1958 in Hong Kong, China as Bai Qiang Chen. He is an actor and producer, known for Last Hero in China (1993), Flirting Scholar (1993) and King of Beggars (1992).
biography.name: Pak-Cheung Chan

biography.bio: Lawrence Cheng was born on December 28, 1954 in Hong Kong. He is an actor and writer, known for The Eye 2 (2004), Da nao guang chang long (1993) and The Yuppie Fantasia (1989).
biography.name: Lawrence Cheng

biography.bio: Bing-Chuen Cheung is known for his work on The Lunatics (1986), Shinjuku Incident: Guerre de gangs à Tokyo (2009) and Happy Ghost III (1986).
biography.name: Bing-Chuen Cheung

biography.bio: Maggie Ho Yee Cheung was born on March 20, 1970 in Hong Kong, China as Maggie Cheung Ho Yee. She is an actress, known for A Better Tomorrow III: Love and Death in Saigon (1989), Punished (2011) and A Smiling Ghost Story (1999).
biography.name: Maggie Ho Yee Cheung

biography.bio: Tat-Ming Cheung was born on July 2, 1964 in Hong Kong, British Crown Colony. He is an actor and writer, known for Espion amateur (2001), You Shoot, I Shoot (2001) and Forbidden City Cop (1996).
biography.name: Tat-Ming Cheung

biography.bio: His father was a famed Cantonese film actor. After studying in the Department of Chemistry in Zhongsha University for 3 years, Chor joined the movie industry as a writer in 1956. His film debut was "The Soul Stealer" directed by Ng Wui. Soon he began working as an assistant director and finally debuted as a director with Chin Chien in the film "Bloodshed in the Valley of Love" in 1957. "Grass by the Lake" (1959) was his first film in solitaire. In 1970, after more than 70 Cantonese films, Chor directed and wrote his first Mandarin "wuxia" film, "Cold Blade", which attracted the attention of the major Chinese film studio at that time, Shaw Bros., so in 1971 Chor finally joined that studio. In 1976 he began his long series of adaptations of Ku Lung's novels with "Killer Clans", which gave him an international reputation.
biography.name: Yuen Chor

biography.bio: Ping Ha was born on October 6, 1937 in Hong Kong, China. She is an actress, known for Espion amateur (2001), Summer Snow (1995) and Flashpoint (2007).
biography.name: Ping Ha

biography.bio: Ka-Fai Ho is an actor, known for Young and Dangerous (1996), Beyond Our Ken (2004) and Yit huet jui keung (1997).
biography.name: Ka-Fai Ho

biography.bio: Vincent Kok was born on August 15, 1965 in Hong Kong. He is an actor and writer, known for Gorgeous (1999), Shaolin Soccer (2001) and CJ7 (2008).
biography.name: Vincent Kok

biography.bio: Elvina Kong was born on July 6, 1967 in Hong Kong as Kong Yan-Yin. She is an actress, known for Police Story 2 (1988), The Iceman Cometh (1989) and Sixty Million Dollar Man (1995). She is married to Jackson Ng.
biography.name: Elvina Kong

biography.bio: Man Ki Kwok is known for his work on Bodyguards & Assassins (2009), The Myth (2005) and Kung Fu Killer (2014).
biography.name: Man Ki Kwok

biography.bio: Chi-Kin Lai is known for his work on She Starts the Fire (1992), To Live and Die in Tsimshatsui (1994) and Lian ai de tian kong (1994).
biography.name: Chi-Kin Lai

biography.bio: Yiu-Cheung Lai was born on May 4, 1964 in Hong Kong, British Crown Colony. He is an actor, known for Filatures (2007), Dog Bite Dog (2006) and The Detective (2007). He has been married to Julia Leung since 1997. They have one child.
biography.name: Yiu-Cheung Lai
